name: WingedStar: Descent
description:
WingedStar: Descent is a challenging 2.5D platformer in which you play as a warrior tasked with defeating the demons and ending their grasp on the world. Throughout this journey you must traverse dangerous areas with varied and challenging threats and fight countless monsters and supernatural beings.

Gameplay Features:
Diverse environments.
Environment threats.
Unique and challenging boss battles.
Miraculous powers to help in your journey.
